hero.title: Build a portfolio without code, then export HTML you own.
hero.description: A focused editor for developers, designers, and artists who want a portfolio in a day. Keep editing locally, export anytime, and deploy wherever you choose.

highlights.title: No-code portfolio editor
highlights.description: Write the story, not the setup. Fill in your profile, projects, and sections from a clean UI.

highlights.title: Local save, always
highlights.description: Your work persists in the browser. Close it today, continue tomorrow, no login required.

highlights.title: Export HTML you own
highlights.description: Download a ready-to-deploy index.html + README guide for GitHub Pages, Vercel, or Netlify.

how.title: How it works
how.description: The editor is built around structured data. Templates render what you write, so your portfolio stays portable.

steps: Pick a template made for your role.
Edit data in a structured, guided form.
Export and deploy anywhere you want.

focus.title: Built for focus
focus.description: No auto-deploy, no lock-in. You own the export and decide where it lives.

mvp.title: MVP priorities
mvp.description: Editor quality and export fidelity first. Logins, cloud save, and deployment integrations come later.

templates.label: Template Gallery
templates.title: Pick a template that fits your story.
templates.description: Every template is designed to export a clean HTML file you fully own. Start with the layout that matches your role, then customize inside the editor.

artistGrid.summary: Visual grid with hero statement and featured works.

studioClassic.summary: Timeline + case studies for studios and small teams.

minimalZen.title: Minimal Zen

boldStatement.title: Bold Statement

productCasebook.title: Product Casebook
productCasebook.summary: Case-study focused layout for product teams and studios.

atelierPortfolio.summary: Editorial layout that centers visuals and captions.

editor.title: Build your portfolio in one flow.
editor.description: Fill in the structured fields on the left. Preview updates instantly on the right.
editor.sectionsDescription: Reorder and edit each section. Saving happens automatically.
editor.previewHeadline: Short headline about what you build and who you help.
